subject: BANK OF AMERICA ,115 W 42ND
body:

subject: Re:   BANK OF AMERICA ,115 W 42ND
body:
Hello Allan,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I received your message regarding the bank transfer fee. Could you please provide me with more details about the fee? What is it for and how much is the amount?

I want to make sure that I have all the necessary information before proceeding with any transfers. Additionally, could you please clarify what you mean by "transfer slip"? Is there a specific document or form that needs to be filled out?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Suzanne
